rukus.text: 38|41|tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ayyoob ko. jab usane pukaara apane paalanahaar ko ki shaitaan ne mujhe pahunchaaya[1] hai duhkh tatha yaatana.
38|42|apana paanv (dharatee par) maar. ye hai sheetal snaan tatha peene ka jal.
38|43|aur hamane pradaan kiya use usaka parivaar tatha unake saath aur unake samaan, apanee daya se aur matimaanon kee shiksha ke lie.
38|44|tatha le apane haath mein teeliyon kee ek jhaad tatha usase maar aur apanee shapath bhang na kar. vaastav[1] mein, hamane use paaya dhairyavaan. nishchay, vah bada dhyaanamagn tha.
38|45|tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ibraaheem, ishaaq evan yaaqoob ko, jo karm shakti tatha gyaanachakshoo[1] vaale the.
38|46|hamane use vishesh kar liya badee visheshata, paralok (aakhirat) kee yaad ke saath.
38|47|vaastav mein, vah hamaare yahaan uttam nirvaachiton mein se the.
38|48|tatha aap charcha karen ismaeel, yas evan zulkifl kee aur ye sabhee nirvaachiton mein se the.
38|49|ye (quraan) ek shiksha hai tatha nishchay aagyaakaariyon ke lie uttam sthaan hai.
38|50|sthaayee svarg, khule hue hain unake lie (unake) dvaar.
38|51|ve takiye lagaaye honge unamen. maangenge unamen bahut-se phal tatha pey padaarth.
38|52|tatha unake paas aankhe seemit rakhanee vaalee samaayu patniyaan hongee.
38|53|ye hai jisaka vachan diya ja raha tha tumhen, haisaab ke din.
38|54|ye hai hamaaree jeevika, jisaka koee ant nahin hai.
38|55|ye hai aur avagyaakaariyon ke lie nishchay bura sthaan hai.
38|56|narak hai, jisamen ve jaayenge, kya hee bura aavaas hai.
38|57|ye hai. to tum chakho, khaulata paanee tatha peep.
38|58|tatha kuchh any isee prakaar kee vibhinn yaatanaayen.
38|59|ye[1] ek aur jattha hai, jo ghusa aa raha hai tumhaare saath. koee svaagat nahin hai unaka. vaastav mein, ve narak mein pravesh karane vaale hain.
38|60|ve uttar dengeh balki tum. tumhaara koee svaagat nahin. tum hee aage laaye ho is (yaatana) ko hamaare. to ye bura nivaas hai.
38|61|(phir) ve kahengeh hamaare paalanahaar! jo hamaare aage laaya hai ise, use duganee yaatana de narak mein.
38|62|tatha (naarakee) kahengeh hamen kya hua hai ki ham kuchh logon ko nahin dekh rahe hain, jinakee ganana ham bure logon mein kar[1] rahe the
38|63|kya hamane unhen upahaas bana rakha tha athava chook rahee hain unase hamaaree aankhen
38|64|nishchay saty hai naarakiyon ka aapas mein jhagadana.
